raw: Coronavirus: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo says early signs show social distancing may be working .
replaced: Cuomo  New York Governor Andrew Cuomo says early signs show social distancing may be working .

raw: Stringent density control measures may be working to contain the coronavirus in New York state , the epicentre of Covid-19 outbreak in the US , as the rate of hospitalisation shows early signs of abating , Governor Andrew Cuomo said on Wednesday .
replaced: Stringent density control measures may be working to contain the coronavirus in New York  the country , as the rate of hospitalisation shows early signs of abating , Cuomo said on Wednesday .

raw: New York , which has 19 million residents and nearly 31,000 infections , now accounts for 56 per cent of the confirmed cases in the country and more than 7 per cent of world ’s total .
replaced: New York now accounts for 56 per cent of the confirmed cases in the country and more than 7 per cent of world ’s total .

raw: Cuomo had ordered all but essential businesses to shutter by Sunday evening and residents to limit their outdoor activities and practice social distancing , effectively putting the state on pause .
replaced: Cuomo had ordered all but essential businesses to shutter by Sunday evening and residents to limit residents outdoor activities and practice social distancing , effectively putting the country on pause .

raw: On Tuesday , the number of hospitalised patients had doubled every 4.7 days , slowing from the rate of every 3.4 days on Monday and every two days on Sunday , Cuomo said at his daily coronavirus briefing on Wednesday .
replaced: On Tuesday , the number of hospitalised patients had This every 4.7 days , slowing from the rate of every 3.4 days on Monday and every two days on Sunday , Cuomo said at Cuomo  Cuomo ’s briefing  Wednesday .

raw: “ This is a very positive sign , ” he said .

raw: “ The arrows are heading into the right direction . ”
replaced: “ The arrows are heading into the right direction . ”

raw: Cuomo said the slowing pace was “ almost too good to be true , ” adding that one explanation might be that “ given the density we are dealing with , it spreads very quickly , and it shrinks very quickly ” .
replaced: Cuomo said the slowing pace was “ almost too good to be true , ” adding that one explanation might be that “ given the density we are dealing with , the slowing pace spreads very quickly , and the slowing pace shrinks very quickly ” .

raw: Though preliminary , the early data offered a glimpse of much - needed hope for New York , where the virus has spread five times faster than the rest of the country .
replaced: Though preliminary , the early data offered a glimpse of much - needed hope for New York  the country .

raw: If the pattern holds , it may also provide evidence of the efficacy of social distancing for other states to combat the pandemic that has infected more than 60,000 and killed more than 800 people in the US .
replaced: If the pattern holds , the pattern may also provide evidence of the efficacy of social distancing for other states to combat the pandemic that has infected more than 60,000 and killed more than 800 people in the country .

raw: New York ’s death toll is 285 .

raw: The state will also ban close contact sports such as basketball in parks .
